content: --- title: Electronic Flight Bag Services description: published: true date: 2025-09-19T16:07:40.725Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2025-07-25T08:38:03.838Z --- # Flight Bag Plan Info Service ### Request ``` https://riverx.sunexpress.com/v1/flight/flightBagPlanInfo/{flightId}?page={page}&size={size} ``` ### Response ```json { "result": [ { "flightId": "20221101-XQ-185", "flightBagPlanInfos": [ { "extraInfo": "Weather update received from ATC", "efbCaptainUserName": "ALEX", "eventType": "FlightBagPlanUpdated", "sectorId": "123456", "cycleId": "CYCLE202404", "eventDate": "2024-04-25T00:00:00Z", "eventProcessedAt": "2024-04-25T00:00:00Z", "ofpNumber": "12" } ] } ], "totalPage": 1, "totalItem": 1 } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getFlightBagPlanInfos ``` # Flight Bag Fuel Service ### Request ``` https://riverx.sunexpress.com/v1/flight/flightBagFuel/{flightId}?page={page}&size={size} ``` ### Response ```json { "result": [ { "flightId": "20221101-XQ-185", "flightBagFuels": [ { "extraInfo": "Weather update received from ATC", "efbCaptainUserName": "ALEX", "eventType": "sector - sector fuel_order", "sectorId": "123456", "cycleId": "CYCLE202404", "eventDate": "2024-04-25T00:00:00Z", "eventProcessedAt": "2024-04-25T00:00:00Z", "ofpNumber": "12", "amountOfFuel": "9700", "reasonOfFuelOrder": "", "unitOfFuel": "kg", } ] } ], "totalPage": 1, "totalItem": 1 } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getFlightBagFuel ```
